name: Configure device to enable a service needed for data extraction
description: Change a setting on a device such that a service needed for data extraction is enabled. This may require a user PIN that can be obtained using other techniques.
examples: Turn on developer mode to make use of Android Debug Bridge (ADB)
references: Android (2025), How to Enable Android Developer Settings: Unlock your Deviceâ€™s Hidden Potential, https://www.android.com/intl/en_uk/articles/enable-android-developer-settings/
